price: Шуморо чи шудааст, ки барои Аллоҳ таоло азамат [-у шукӯҳ] қоил нестед?
arabic: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارٗا

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: mā lakum lā tarjūna lillahi waqāran
